name: Malvina Wars
description:
This is turn-based 2D RPG like old RPG Wizardry, but also like latest MOBA like dota2 or Paladins. 

You choose 6 members from 16 heros, that has role as tank, healer, damage and assasin. 

There are always six enemy members, and they choose actions randomly, but if you don't play carefully, the enemy may be strong.

I will make tutorial Youtube video later.
